recipeFluff.name: "Orc" Bacon
entries: 不，它不是由兽人制作的，而是为兽人制作的。半兽人发现这种美味的小吃很合他们的口味，Eberron的巨人和一些游戏中的人类和半兽人也是如此。据说，一个名叫马兹莫拉斯（Mazmorras）的半兽人是第一个发现这种腌制猪肉条的辛辣配方的人，你几乎可以在20码之外品尝到它。有时被称为 "格鲁姆什的猪肉"，兽人用黑胡椒和大蒜调味；而半兽人可能会用一些枫糖浆来抹去边缘。有经验的冒险者在兽人的土地上冒险时知道，扔下一捆培根可以让追兵失去踪迹，而兽人甚至还知道与携带培根的人类进行交换。为了获得最佳效果，请尝试使用塔扬-杜姆瓦特（Tayan Doomvault）的猪跑肉--它有适当的效力。

recipeFluff.name: Amphail Braised Beef
entries: 法鲁恩的德萨林山谷地区提供的远不止是肥沃的土地和雄伟的日落（以及游荡的怪物）。它也是整个托里尔最好的养牛场的所在地。这道肉质鲜美的慢火烤牛肉，灵感来自于安普海尔村奥甘特尔家族的一个流行的地区食谱，用苹果酒、梨和生姜烹制，所有这些都有助于激活肉的全部味道。姜为这道菜提供了令人愉悦的温暖和意想不到的细微差别，而不是公开的姜味，而发酵的硬梨苹果酒提供了一丝残留的甜味，尽管是干的和土的。不要着急，如果你找不到硬梨苹果酒（有时称为 "佩里"），那么苹果也可以。烤红薯或冬瓜是一种美味的佐料，配上一两勺甜味汁，味道非常好。

recipeFluff.name: Arkhan the Cruel's Flame-Roasted Halfling Chili
entries: 给肉神的肉! 可以理解的是，半身人的准备工作在许多王国都是不受欢迎的，但食用半身人是龙裔美食的重要组成部分。然而，这个食谱据传是残忍的阿克汗的私人食谱，他是五头龙女神提亚马特的臭名昭著的弟子，因此值得列入。你不会看到这位凶猛狡猾的破誓者圣骑士在他的辣椒中吃不到最好的半身人肉，但这些香料与你选择的任何肉类替代品都有很好的效果--在这个例子中，辣火鸡或深渊鸡，与菜豆、五香粉、丁香、卡宴和韦克纳的一小撮可可粉一起炖了几个小时。这种饱满的肉酱可以按碗食用，也可以舀在其他野兽（肉）或面条上食用。

recipeFluff.name: Bacon-Wrapped Smoked Mussels
entries: Sigil's lively marketplaces are brimming with strange, fresh meats and fish imported from across the greater multiverse. These expansive emporiums are an overwhelming explosion of scents, textures, colors, and flavors, not only making them a chef's dream but a breeding ground for new culinary ideas. Bacon-Wrapped Smoked Mussels is one such intrinsically Sigil meal on offer in many of the city's six wards. While the combination of pork and mollusk might seem unusual, this atypical culinary marriage is what makes the meal uniquely Sigil. An inspired combination of surf and turf, this dish has made its way across the multiverse as far as the Cutlass of Luskan on Toril, where fresh mussels are harvested in droves from the Sea of Swords, while the cured bacon is brought in almost daily from Mirabar via the River Mirar.

recipeFluff.name: Bangers and Smash
entries: 没有什么能让一个小矮人在早晨站得这么高，就像早餐拼盘上蒸着香肠和捣碎的小土豆一样。这些传统的香肠是用多汁的西红柿平底锅烤制的，这些西红柿吸收了香肠的汁液，几乎是自己变成了肉。众所周知，矮人铁匠将他们的香肠和土豆泥放在炉子上方的铁锅里保温一上午，这样他们就可以用叉子插进去，满足他们的胃口，而不会偏离他们的职责。

recipeFluff.name: Barovian Butterscotch Pudding
entries: 在吃过美味的狼排、一些黄油大蒜面包和几杯红龙碎酒之后，没有什么比蓝水旅馆著名的巴罗维亚奶油布丁更能满足甜食的需求了。这道菜就像高脚杯里的猫头鹰牛奶一样甜美、顺滑。但是，对于那些试图穿越巴罗维亚的幽灵般的迷雾，在他们的场所用餐的人来说，有几条建议。(1）在夜幕降临前回家，尤其是在满月期间；（2）不要在雷文洛夫特城堡过夜，无论主人多么希望你留下；（3）不惜一切代价避免在酒仙子葡萄园边上的梦幻馅饼和紫色葡萄醪3号

recipeFluff.name: Barovian Garlic Bread
entries: This buttery bread, served in both loaf and knot form, is ever-present in the taverns and inns dotting the misty (and eerie) Barovian countryside. While it's not uncommon for wayward travelers to get the cold shoulder from reclusive and suspicious denizens, inns such as the Blue Water will at least offer a warm basket of this local treat to well-mannered and paying patrons. It is important to note that although garlic is a flavorful and inspired touch, it is not indigenous to the region. You'll find this pungent bread pairs nicely with a main of medium-rare wolf steak and a glass of Wizard of Wines' Champagne du le Stomp or Red Dragon Crush, but avoid the {@recipe Purple Grapemash No. 3|HFFotM} at all costs.

recipeFluff.name: Beer Bread
entries: Many eateries across the multiverse claim to have the best beer-bread recipe, but Fortune's Wheel, an upscale canteen in Sigil's aristocratic Lady's Ward, really does. Any bread with beer in the dough is considered a beer bread, and the results are usually as middling as the common brew. However, this recipe from Fortune's Wheel yields a moist and chewy loaf that is bound to become a mealtime staple on any dinner table. Different types of beer yield distinctive flavors of bread and, depending on the varietal, it may even add leavening to the baking process, changing the ultimate density of the loaf. But regardless of the beer you choose (the Fortune's Wheel uses a dark, dry stout), it's all about the quality of the batter.

recipeFluff.name: Beluir Poached Salmon
entries: Known as the unofficial capital of the former halfling nation of Luiren, Beluir was well regarded for its friendly folk, its strategic port location, and, of course, its food. The city's proximity to forests, rich farmland, and the sea made it an obvious destination for chefs and diners from across the Realms. And few dishes stood out more than Beluir's famous poached salmon. Available at virtually any eating house in town, the most traditional preparation came from the Friendly Burrow tavern, which created a mouthwatering spread, comprising both fresh and smoked salmon, herbs, cream cheese, and a touch of cayenne, served atop a baguette with a sprinkle of capers. If you couldn't get into the Friendly Burrow (it was always packed), the Cold Duck Inn made a worthy representation, and they even had rooms for rent that could accommodate "tall folk" guests who needed a rest after all that dining. While Luiren is no more, this famous dish can still be found on board various halfling-crewed spelljammers who commandeered this dish as their own.

recipeFluff.name: Black Lotus Root
entries: There is one curriculum rarely discussed at Strixhaven University—feasting. But with offerings at the school's refectories as eclectic as its student body, aspiring mages from across the multiverse are exposed to exotic, colorful, and delicious meals to keep their learning minds inspired. At the Bow's End Tavern, a popular campus eatery, one culinary rite of passage is the pickled Black Lotus Root. This earthy yet tangy treat is an addictive nibble, notorious for turning the tongues of those who eat it purple. First years often flash their lilac tongues on campus like a badge of courage. Notably, Black Lotus Root pairs well with nearly any of the colorful (and alchemical) concoctions on tap.

recipeFluff.name: Black Pudding
entries: 不，不是那个黑色的布丁! 食用真正的怪物是不稳定的游戏。当然，有些怪物被认为是美味佳肴，拥有难以想象的复杂口味，但大多数怪物充满了毒素和毒药，根本不值得冒险，更不用说要真正捕获和杀死你的晚餐了。这道传统的咖啡和巧克力慕斯的灵感来自于那些讨厌的地牢居住的野兽之一，并以一道名为 "精灵布丁 "的地精菜肴为基础（你不会想知道的），肯定能满足最挑剔的矮人味觉。这种浓郁的咖啡色甜点被认为可以让矮人在锻造时一直工作到凌晨。在它吃掉你之前吃掉它吧!

recipeFluff.name: Blood of Vol
entries: In the military nation of Karnath, the faith known as the Blood of Vol symbolizes the inherent divinity within all people, stressing the power and comfort of the bonds that we form in this life. Exactly how the name of that religion became attached to this Eberron dish is a bit obscure—but the first bite you take will send divine strength coursing through your veins. The egg base is chock-full of sausage, onions, bell peppers, and enough spices to purify the soul—or in some cases, make you feel the flames of damnation, if there is such a thing. Some establishments serve this with an absolutely scorching amount of pepper, and its devotees settle for nothing less.

recipeFluff.name: Boar Hock Soup
entries: Whether you make boar hock soup at the hearth of a cozy inn or on the campfire after the hunt, it is a meal unto itself. Like traditional bone-based soups, this version was originally created to let no part of a boar go wasted—in this case, the hock, or lower leg. But in times of plenty, you can still find soups filled with generous chunks of boar and without any bones to speak of. The genius of this recipe is in its recognition that boar is best complemented by a classic, creamy potato-leek soup. Brimming with whatever other veggies and spices you can get your hands on—even chestnuts are great in the mix—it is a savory, hearty celebration of the bounty of nature. Perfect for a cold, windy night.

recipeFluff.name: Brackleberry Jam
entries: Brackleberry Jam is the Cormyrean moniker for a spread made from a medley of freshly foraged wild berries—one that has earned notoriety throughout the multiverse. While the Cormyr version utilizes strawberries, raspberries, blackberries, gooseberries, and even currants, all iterations of this well-traveled recipe call for fresh blueberries and sugar to properly flavor the mixture. A spritz of lemon and a dash of salt help to not only preserve the mash for canning but brighten the overall experience on the palette. Brackleberry Jam is as common as butter in the forest-heavy country of Cormyr, where its topography and climate yield an abundance of seasonal berries so plentiful they colorfully adorn the region's roads and trails. This jam spreads well on almost any warm loaf or muffin. In the Feywild, the berries are not only more bountiful but also more flavorful, resulting in an exquisite local variety of Brackleberry Jam.

recipeFluff.name: Braised Lamb
entries: 这道古朴的红烧羊肉食谱的灵感来自于明麦斯半兽人的烹饪传统，他们是来自法鲁恩东北部荒凉的寒地瓦萨郊区的一个隐居部落。他们以战斗力极强而闻名，但在其他方面却很平庸（或更少）。虽然有几个兽人长老住在明玛斯人中间，担任治疗师、巫师和讲故事的人，但由可怕而睿智的卡拉图尔-明玛斯领导的部族，对食物和政治采取了非典型的态度。同样，他们的味觉范围也很大，从鱼、奶酪和面包等微妙的人类食物到兽人对大型猎物肉类的渴望。但这种分裂产生了意想不到的烹饪好处，包括一种深刻的肉类准备方法，将独特的兽人风味与人类技术结合起来。明麦斯氏族为自己的战斗力而自豪，就像这道羊肉烩一样，在质地和味道上都是无与伦比的。

recipeFluff.name: Breaded Bird Cutlets
entries: No one is quite sure how this crispy and succulent breaded chicken dish has proliferated across many planets of the multiverse, but why it appears on the menus of so many eateries is blatantly obvious—it's as classic as it is delicious. Traditional preparation of this multiversal main requires tenderizing and breading the cutlets to ensure that the chicken remains soft and moist. Each thin cutlet, the size of an orc's palm, is then fried in a flash to lock in the juices. Breaded Bird Cutlets are primarily served seasoned, lathered with butter, and spritzed with lemon, although breadings and sauces can vary greatly depending on the world and the occasion. If someone in your party is feeling adventurous, order a "stack"—three sizzling cutlets on a platter—which will surely satiate even the grandest appetite.

recipeFluff.name: Butternut Beer
entries: As most adventurers know, there are serious spirits, hard liquors, and courage-enhancing brews that serve to bolster one's resolve before a trip down the well into the Undermountain. The drink known as butternut beer is none of these things. Instead, it is a sweetened and mirthful beverage best served as a dessert for a hearty meal or after a long day's night exploring Halaster's lair. Although it packs enough bourbon and butterscotch schnapps to rattle the senses, it is not intended to impair judgment. Rather, it's meant to encourage a hearty belly laugh and dull the aches of an adventurer's knotted muscles.

recipeFluff.name: Bytopian Shepherd's Bread
entries: 也许在各个星球中，没有什么美食能比阿西玛人的美食更超凡脱俗，他们是天人的遥远后裔。但即使是阿西玛人也有一半是人类，他们对凡人食物的需求就是为什么许多人相信在双子乐园常见的面包配方最终是源于阿西玛人的。这款香喷喷的面包被切成厚片，是用胡萝卜碎末和丰富的杏仁块浸泡的谷物制成。对于在拜托比亚的田园谷地工作的坚韧的牧羊人来说，它是一种美味的开胃菜。大胆的冒险家们，请注意：如果你发现自己拥有被称为shiftspice的稀有草药，请在面糊中撒上一小撮，以确保每个面包都能产生完全意想不到的味道。

recipeFluff.name: Castle Amber Onion Soup
entries: 按照神秘的丹伯维尔家族的古老食谱，可以制作出丰富而丰盛的汤，丹伯维尔家族是以其精心准备的宴会而闻名的流氓巫师和异次元旅行者。按照传统，第一道菜是这道洋葱汤，配上带胡椒的面包丁和融化的格鲁耶尔奶酪，通常与醇厚的琥珀色葡萄酒相配。虽然大多数人认为安伯维尔家族的血统已经灭绝，但据传在某些夜晚，他们的灵魂会回到祖先的庄园，在那里他们会宴请勇于与死者共餐的冒险家。那些吃了原始菜肴的人，在其创造者的魔法的强化下，据说会出现更高的复原力！"。

recipeFluff.name: Cherrybread
entries: 在多元宇宙的一些世界里，这种密集的甜点面包也被命名为 "水果蛋糕"。无论名称或起源如何，樱桃面包拥有各种切块，包括用烈酒和坚果（核桃和榛子）腌制的干果（樱桃、枣、香橼、醋栗、葡萄干，有时还有更多），所有这些都由足够的香草面糊（加点糖蜜）固定在一起，完成工作。它以小面包蛋糕或适合旅行的叶子包裹的切片形式在王国的烘焙店中出售。虽然这种食品在节假日期间大受欢迎，但樱桃面包在全年都能为山路上或山路外的茶水时间带来美妙的享受。

recipeFluff.name: Chicken-Something Dumplings
entries: 你难道不想知道使这些神奇美味的面团在你口中融化的半身人的秘密成分吗？好吧，现在你会知道了! 从Faerûn的Corm Orp著名的饥饿半身人到整个大陆几乎每一个半身人的晚餐桌，这道丰盛的、天鹅绒般的混合物加上自制的水饺是最舒适的食物。这道菜有无数的变体，每个半身人家庭都声称提供最好的服务，但没有什么能胜过浓炖的经典之作--强大的家禽汤底，加上新鲜采摘的蔬菜、欧芹和大蒜的味道，与奶油面团混合在一起。
The food served there is as good and hearty as popular lore credits halflings for. (The chicken dumplings are superb.)
entries.from: Volo's Guide To The Sword Coast

recipeFluff.name: Chickpea and Spicy Sausage Soup
entries: Serving equally well as a solo course or as a starter paired with a lighter main, Chickpea and Spicy Sausage Soup is a hearty, delicious, protein-filled potage. As served in Sigil, this soup incorporates Sweet Larissa's sausages, imported from Plague-Mort—the less you know about how she makes them the better. But one thing you will know is she makes them hot: with the sort of spices mortals should avoid unless in ethereal form. The chickpeas offer a starchy and earthy sanctuary from the oily, spicy sausage and red pepper flakes, all of it swimming in a garlicky chicken broth, flavored with tomato. Common variations on this dish introduce tarragon for a pungent and inspired twist on the classic. Although widely available, and often considered a meal for the masses, this is nonetheless a delectable soup that has rightfully earned its place in the heart of many citizens of the greater multiverse.

recipeFluff.name: Chirper's Sugar Biscuits
entries: No matter what you order at Chirper's in the Market Ward of Sigil—from the Niflheim stag ribs to the slaad legs—the sugar biscuits are a complimentary finale. Whether you came for the dancing, the Seawind theater, an art exhibition, or just a quick visit to gawk at the Skull Museum, it is always worth grabbing a bite at Chirper's for the dessert alone. Acquiring the Bytopian chestnuts required to make the puffy dough might require planar travel, but primes can approximate the right taste by adding some cinnamon and cardamom to the mix. Best served with honey as a dip for an extra dash of decadence.

recipeFluff.name: Chopforest
entries: Many examinations of early Yawning Portal menus have noted that its heavy, often greasy, fare had a celebratory "last meal" sense about it. This is likely because return from the Undermountain was simply not expected, with only the soiled dishware of stout adventurers left behind. However, as more adventurers survived the mad mage Halaster's labyrinth, the menu evolved to accommodate a balance of healthier options. Senior cook Jarandur Tallstand adapted the traditional wood-elven forest salad, or chopforest, as it has been called, to complement the heavier menu options with its mix of peppered leaves, olives, fennel, and tangy vinaigrette dressing. It is said that a chopforest delivered unto your table, compliments of Yawning Portal proprietor and Undermountain gatekeeper {@creature Durnan|WDH}, is a happy omen before one's descent to Undermountain.

recipeFluff.name: Chultan Zombie
entries: 位于法鲁恩西南海岸的尼安扎鲁港是文明的最后堡垒，这里有难以驯服的亡灵出没的丛林、危险的河流和超大的阿尔法掠夺者。你可能已经看到了一只巨大的霸王龙，但除非你尝过 "僵尸"，否则你就没有真正到过楚尔特，这是一种质朴的果汁鸡尾酒，由本地农产品、当地利口酒和各种朗姆酒组成。在镇上几乎每家餐馆都用巨大的木碗盛着，"僵尸 "拥有诱人的天鹅绒般的甜味，隐藏着潜伏在表面下的酒精波。野生的新鲜味道在你的味蕾上碰撞，让你感觉就像艾尔明斯特在你的嘴里施了一个魅力咒语。给聪明的旅行者一个忠告。在你去猎取恐龙之前，不要喝一碗这个......或者喝了，如果你需要液体灵感的额外推动。在霍尔韦尔的Q'barra丛林边界的悬崖上，有一种展示当地水果的 "僵尸 "版本的饮水机。其他变化包括来自弗拉纳斯的同样美味的无酒精品种，非常适合年轻的冒险家。

recipeFluff.name: Cloaks
entries: Ideal as a filling comfort food, cloaks are finger snacks made from whipped potatoes, eggs, butter, and fresh spices. They get their name from their shape; as they bake, puffing into luxurious, golden-brown coverings, which look like warm winter cloaks. While some taverns pan-sear Cloaks in oil to give them a crispy, crunchy exterior, most establishments bake them and the dish is often thought to be best right out of the oven, soft and piping hot inside. On a cold day, a few Cloaks will warm you right up. In Kalaman they squeeze a bit of lemon juice on top to give it a little zing, and in springtime, it's not unusual to find a few edible flowers draped over them. Cloaks make a perfect side for fish or poultry, but eat enough of them, and you may end up skipping the main course entirely.

recipeFluff.name: Cocoa Broth
entries: 一个温暖的壁炉，一把舒适的椅子，和一杯热气腾腾的巧克力，液体的美味--对于半身人来说，这就是七重天（确切地说，是维尼亚的绿色山丘）。据传闻，这是一个半身人法师为寻找完美的炉边饮料而投下的心愿，这种咸、甜、辣的可可制品让味蕾的每一部分都感到痒痒的，并为灵魂的每一部分欢呼。在咖啡中加入来自托里尔一个叫图坎的遥远地区的香料，只要在这种饮料中加入一些棉花糖，拿起一本好书或卷轴，你就可以叫它晚安了。

recipeFluff.name: Community Cheeses
entries: 如果桌子上没有一大锅社区奶酪供大家享用，那就不是半身人的聚会了！这种多奶酪的混合物由两种奶酪组成，在均匀的小火上，用酒慢慢融化。这种多种奶酪的混合物由两种奶酪组成，在火锅中用均匀的小火慢慢融化，并洒上葡萄酒。关键是不要煮得太熟，也不要让独特的奶酪味道同质化，这确保每一口都有惊人的新口味组合。通常与水果、肉块或方块面包一起呈现，这种火锅非常适合蘸取匕首。只是一定要先把血迹清理掉！"。

recipeFluff.name: Corned Beef and Cabbage
entries: 从铁根山的矿场到铁山的大厅，这道美味的冬季大餐是各地矮人的最爱。当饥饿的矿工们的鼻子闻到香菜、五香粉、花椒、月桂叶、百里香和红辣椒片从满满的大锅里飘出的独特香味时，他们的脸会比牛肉本身还要红。这道菜在清淡、浓郁的汤汁中，加上大量的水煮卷心菜，并浇上醋，肯定能满足最咸的矮人对盐的渴望（只要你不忘记麦酒）。

recipeFluff.name: Dark Molasses Nutbread
entries: 从Silverymoon到Sharn，这种经典面包（有时被称为Amn Blackbread）的变化非常多，但大多数人都认为，当用Amn最甜、最强的糖蜜制作的时候，这种烘烤的食物是最好的。传统上，这种面包是按片供应的，勇敢的人可以在两面涂上打发的咸黄油。这种致密而美味的面包，在各地的旅店里伴随着许多主菜，往往足以让人饱餐一顿。

recipeFluff.name: Deep Gnome Trillimac Pods
entries: 如果你要寻找的是稀有的东西，那你就来对地方了。Trillimac真菌是暗黑世界中最珍贵、最喜怒无常的植物之一，似乎只有Blingdenstone城的深层地精知道其种植和制备的秘密。传统上，这种地下主食是通过清洗、浸泡和干燥三叶草茎来制作的，它可以制成美味的海绵状面包，在架子上可以保存数周--这是曼托尔-德里斯地下市场上的热门交易或销售项目。然而，你在市场上找不到的是trillimac意大利面，不信任的svirfneblin只对自己保留。这款超凡脱俗的面食由坚果状的三叶草茎粉制成，里面是由这种稀有植物的顶端制成的泥土味儿。尝一口，你就会在暗黑世界中寻找第二份。如果你在采购真正的金合欢面时遇到困难（你会的），可以用薄的小麦面团包装，但不要想用金合欢顶上的馅料代替。

recipeFluff.name: Delayed Blast Fireball
entries: 被称为 "延迟爆炸火球 "的混合饮料，其名称来自于著名的破坏性巫师咒语，这并非巧合。有时被称为 "火星酒"，这种带有肉桂味的甜味和糖浆混合饮料味道层次分明，具有很强的冲击力，对得起其神秘的名字。香料波旁酒和辛辣的胡椒片形成了一种致命的美味组合，容易下咽，但在晚上的几轮饮料中都能发挥其全部效果。

recipeFluff.name: Delzoun "Tide-Me-Overs"
entries: 牛肉、猪肉、洋葱和少量的矮人调料都被卷成了美味的小球，非常适合作为零食或宴会的主菜。这些 "肉丸"，在多元宇宙中被称为 "肉丸"，有时会和新鲜的酸浆果一起供应给外出的矮人，但最好是浸泡在用鸡汤制成的甜而深的矮人肉汁中，并加入红糖、柠檬和酱油。虽然这些都是霍尔姆特（Hornmoot）的惯例消费品，即标志着春天来临的传统人类-矮人贸易节，但在多事的矮人日历上，没有一个节日的菜单上不出现这些美味的肉类。

recipeFluff.name: Dragon Salmon
entries: 昂代尔是Eberron的Khorvaire的面包篮，昂代尔河因半精灵垂钓者将海鲜带回费尔哈文的市场而闻名。他们对在那条河里产卵的巨大鲑鱼的传统准备，就像昂代尔的许多其他东西一样，主要依靠酱汁：在这种情况下，是黄油和黑葡萄酒的还原。贵族们只品尝一小块鱼片，然后再继续吃其他的菜，但在更简单的家庭里，一条龙鲑鱼就可以养活一家人。吃完鱼后，当地人会转向cremfel，一种薄薄的煎饼，里面塞满了丰富的奶油和新鲜水果片。

recipeFluff.name: Drow Mushroom Steaks
entries: 作为伟大的暗黑蜘蛛城Menzoberranzan的特色美食，这些调味的波纹树皮蘑菇排是从多尼加藤湖附近的真菌田中新鲜采摘的。虽然它们的确切农艺学是一个被严密保护的乌鸦秘密，但许多人推测，来自多尼加藤岛的肥料使这些蘑菇长得异常大，肉质饱满，而且营养丰富。它们是如此美味和有嚼头，你会认为你在吃独角兽! 这道菜已经变得如此受欢迎，以至于它已经迁移到了地表，甚至有传言说它是沃特德普（Waterdeep）的夏纳塔尔（Xanathar）的最爱，他是一个臭名昭著的看客，他更喜欢吃地表生长的蘑菇以及生肉。但一定要仔细阅读那瓶香醋的标签--鸦人的毒药和他们的酱汁一样出名。

recipeFluff.name: Duergar Smoked Herring
entries: To many duergar, dwarves of the Underdark, food is simply the nourishment needed to get back to work. But the duergar are also renowned craftsmen, and what they do, they do well, which includes cooking a small but reliable menu of staples. And perhaps no duergar food is more prized than their smoked herring. While the original boasts herring from the dangerous depths of Darklake, known for imbuing the fish with distinctive brine and mineral flavorings, this version utilizes herring sourced from bountiful Lake Bral, a vital repository of water located in the center of this well-populated asteroid. There is no denying that a proper subterranean brine takes especially well to heat from Underdark fire lichen, but chile peppers will suffice for those chefs cooking on the surface. A specialty of the duergar enclave at the Underdark trading post of Mantol-Derith, this maritime delicacy is much sought after, from far below the surface of Toril all the way to the otherworldly Rock of Bral.

recipeFluff.name: Dwarven Flatbread
entries: Generations of dwarven smiths have relied on this toothsome snack bread to get them through long, arduous workdays, and to their next meal. According to folklore, these tasty flat loaves weren't created in the kitchen, but rather at the forge as ever-industrious, hungry dwarven craftsman utilized the only materials they had available: flour, oil, water, salt, a hearth, and a hammer. The result? Flat bread. Sometimes served pan-griddled, other times fried, this bread can be eaten plain, topped with cheese or {@recipe Underdark Lotus with Fire Lichen Spread||duergar fire lichen spread}, or used to soak up all of those savory juices and sauces from what dwarven diners showed up for in the first place—meat!

recipeFluff.name: Dwarven Mulled Wine
entries: 这种混合饮料被矮人外交官称为 "物质世界这边最好的闷酒"，是一种多文化的事情。最初是为了庆祝《剑鞘卷轴》的签署而制作的，该卷轴结束了弑神者战争，并在索尔巴丁矮人和附近的克莱恩的奎林斯提精灵之间签订了条约，矮人酒匠将他们自己的醇厚的龙酒和当地香料与奎林斯提提供的精致的新鲜水果相结合。其结果是一种完美平衡、辛辣和甜美的混合物，当他们在寒冷的冬天建造他们共同的堡垒帕克萨斯时，这种混合物满足并温暖了两个群体的内心。多年后，在长矛战争期间，这个配方被索兰尼亚骑士团的大团长冈萨大人所推广，他将其作为最受欢迎的睡前酒提供给来访的骑士（和他自己）。这款果味浓郁的葡萄酒以橙片、红糖、肉桂和丁香为调味剂，具有矮人大小的冲击力，但肯定会在圣诞节或一年中的任何时候让你的骨头解冻。

recipeFluff.name: Eldeen Banquet
entries: Despite its promise of a "banquet," the dish known as Eldeen Banquet is actually a hearty, one-dish meal sure to satisfy omnivores as much as vegetarians. Consisting of lightly breaded and fried eggplant topped with a warm, seasoned tomato sauce, this delight hails from the Eldeen Reaches, in the Khorvaire region of Eberron, which is noted for its robust forests and agriculture, and where the dish has occasionally migrated to the Feywild via a secret Fey Crossing. But while Eldeen Banquet is considered a regional delicacy, interpretations of the crispy, yet spongy, eggplant patty are common in esteemed eateries throughout the city of Sharn. High-end restaurants such as the Azure Gateway and the Celestial Vista, in the Skyway district, offer plates of Eldeen Banquet as delightful as their views. However, perhaps the best preparation is found in the unassuming Olladra's Arms, in the Hope's Peak district. Here, the portions are as generous as they are flavorful, ensuring the dish truly lives up to its moniker.

recipeFluff.name: Elfharrow Baked Goat Cheese
entries: Centuries of deforestation has caused the elves of Elfharrow to get more creative with their diets than those of their forest-based counterparts. Raising livestock has become a way of life for these elves, making dairy a central staple of their foodways. This traditional Elfharrow dish features medallions of goat cheese crusted in breadcrumbs and baked. The key ingredient, though, is a tangy mustard, said to originate in the Feywild, and the dish goes best with a green salad on the side. A word of caution: Don't try to source your ingredients in Elfharrow—these elves are quite a bit more territorial and protective than their northern cousins and a visit there could be your last.

recipeFluff.name: Elven Bread
entries: 精灵面包师保护这种面包的秘密已经有几千年了。这种面包营养丰富，味道鲜美，吃一口这种神秘的卷状面饼就能让一个冒险者维持一天或更长时间的旅程。精灵面包味道甜美而浓郁，由精细的谷物和丰富的黄油制成，据说它的营养价值是铁质口粮的两倍，而重量却只有铁质口粮的一半，这使它成为精灵们旅途中必不可少的冒险食物。即使是最挑剔的高等精灵也无法抗拒这种健康的、肉桂的、有时是豆蔻的食物。

recipeFluff.name: Elven Flatbread
entries: Elven Flatbread is much more of a delight than its unassuming name suggests. A mosaic of colors and flavors, the thinly sliced vegetables, edible flora, and wild herbs are so elegantly placed atop this chewy focaccia that you almost want to admire it more than eat it. A cornucopia of garden-fresh components frequently make starring appearances—from onions, bell peppers, chives, and cherry tomatoes to sunflowers, elderflowers, squash blossoms, and sprigs of basil. Almost nothing is off-limits when it comes to topping; the only (unspoken) rule is to keep it vibrant and arrange them artfully. Despite elven flatbread being a "simple" bread recipe, Feywild eladrin pride themselves on flare and personal presentation. During harvest holidays, each flatbread is presented as a long and ornate loaf that serves as both a centerpiece and a meal starter for dipping in sharp, fragrant olive oils.

recipeFluff.name: Elven Marruth
entries: 这些两口的周转式糕点，里面塞满了各种地区的蔬菜碎末，非常适合在小路边或宴会桌上吃。有时，矮人和人类将其归纳为 "根馅饼"，marruth是令人难以置信的丰盛的封闭式小点心，里面装满了香料和香草的蔬菜泥（卷心菜、土豆和胡萝卜），然后用薄薄的黄油皮轻轻烤制。传统上，这些糕点是热着吃的，有时本身就是一顿饭，用冰镇的艾尔维克斯酒来冲淡它们。冷却后，这些糕点可以被卷进乌桕叶（厚而油腻的防水阔叶）中，以保存它们用于旅行。

recipeFluff.name: Elverquisst
entries: This autumnal aperitif of rare quality and divine taste is customarily served in conjunction with an elven high ceremony. Traditional Elverquisst vintages are distilled from orosks and resmers (rare summer fruits indigenous to Evereska) and sunshine, and it sips as smoothly as a cool mountain stream. Elves store their Elverquisst in crystal decanters capable of absorbing light and showcasing the tantalizing specks of gold dancing about in the rich claret mixture. According to legend, upon whispering a secret Elvish phrase, the sunlight streaming through the bottle will gather into thirteen points, resembling the constellation Correlian. Regardless, Elverquisst is highly prized by the elves and is a uniquely enchanting sip for curious imbibers who can get their hands on a bottle of this rare beverage.

recipeFluff.name: Emerald Chicken
entries: It is fact that the only way in or out of Sigil is through one of the city's innumerable portals. It is also fact that while in Sigil, one must try the famous Emerald Chicken. Gifted its name from the splash of chopped greens, intermingled with chunks of fowl, chicken livers, onions, and a strong dash of incendiary spices, Emerald Chicken demands an adventurous palate—it was originally made for tieflings with fiendspices—and a cool glass of ale to quench the burn. A milder version became famous in far-off Purskul, on Toril, in eateries such as the Owlroost Head.

recipeFluff.name: Evermead
entries: 由Evermeet的秘密配方制作而成，并经过数百年的陈酿，喝一口这种灿烂的精灵调和物，就是 "更高层次的味道"。撇开夸张的说法，在烹饪领域，它无疑是衡量所有其他饮料的标准。这款非凡的灵药光滑而芳香，用苜蓿蜂蜜和精灵果实和谷物的混合体的强大气息覆盖了味觉，这些果实和谷物如此罕见，甚至在通用语言中都没有名字。据传，这种酒使用的原料和技术与费酒相似，这种昂贵的酒只在法鲁恩以西无轨海的埃弗米特岛或奥罗拉的目录中以手摇桶或瓶装的方式出售。如果你有幸尝到了原汁原味的酒，一定要慢慢地喝--它能迅速地让人陶醉，让人振奋。不过，这个配方是在没有酒精的情况下制作的，以保持你更好的判断力。

recipeFluff.name: Everything Soup
entries: 这道丰盛的汤被命名为半身人的传统，即在紧张地期待着接待客人时疯狂地搜刮他们的储藏室和花园。有时被称为 "欢迎汤"，这道汤本身就是一餐，充满了五颜六色的蔬菜（包括多达四种不同颜色的胡萝卜！）、青豆、豌豆、甜火石玉米、红甜椒，以及美味的汤汁中的家禽。应该指出的是，一些冒险的半身人大胆地将鸡肉和火鸡汤混合起来，以获得额外的动力。这道丰盛的汤会让你感到无比温暖。它还能治疗诅咒，或者说是传闻中的诅咒。

recipeFluff.name: Fey Fritters
entries: No elven feast is complete without a basket (or three) of freshly fried sweet-pea Fey Fritters on offer. The nuanced yet indulgent combination of fresh sweet peas, shallots, and feta cheese is a match made in Arvandor, especially once handfuls of the bite-size bounty are dipped in batter and fried to perfection. From Prismeer to Evermeet, elves and those with whom they hold court relish these comforting table treats. Fey Fritters come with a warning: Once you try one, you'll want to spend all day eating these scrumptious snacks...and often, in the Feywild, you just do! It is believed that the recipe originated a millennium ago in the elven enclave of Evermeet, far before it was transported to the Plane of Faerie following the Spellplague. These tasty delicacies have been a mainstay on elven dining tables ever since.

recipeFluff.name: Feywild Eggs
entries: 在 "主位面"（包含多元宇宙中所有已知世界的位面）有一个平行的位面，被称为 "精灵界"（Feywild）或 "精灵界"（Plane of Faerie），小精灵、萨提尔、独角兽、干尸等精灵生物就是从这里起源的。正是在这个沐浴在永恒的暮色和空灵的光辉中的镜像领域，所有的精灵都是从旋转的、无限的魔法中诞生的，包括与季节有着深不可测的联系的精灵。这些精灵仍然以费伊维度为家，他们拥有与自然的高度直觉联系，能够用近乎完美的成分组合制作出令人难以置信的食物。有一道菜被称为 "精灵蛋"，是一道令人愉快的奶油蛋、香草蛋和绒毛蛋，用均匀的火力完成，最后变成金黄色的脆皮。有些人声称这个简单的食谱是勒沙伊人的后代，勒沙伊人是不朽的费伊 "精灵 "品种，具有不可思议的神力。值得庆幸的是，你不需要去仙境就可以尝试这些鸡蛋。一个有良好声誉的精灵保证，这种混合物是相当正宗的精灵饮食。

recipeFluff.name: Fig Cakes
entries: Fig cakes are an easily preserved pouch snack for explorers with a sweet tooth. A perfect fig cake is as much about the fig as it is about the lightly toasted and ground almonds that form this fruity confection's chewy base. While honeyed fig tarts were extremely popular in Calimshan on the planet Toril, it is believed that this unique dessert originally hailed from the desolate wastes of the Shadowfell. Developed by the elves native to the Plane of Shadow called the Shadar-Kai, these treats are sweet enough to be at home even in the dreamy Feywild. In addition to the sesame seeds and anise seeds, a strong brandy is often infused into the mix, to both sweeten and fortify these small pressed cakes. While fig cakes do not come cheap, they are, nonetheless, a proud (and delicious) reminder of the resourcefulness of the Shadar-Kai.

recipeFluff.name: Fire-Spiced Abyssal Chicken Kebabs
entries: 不可否认的是，一个盗贼的独特的地狱遗产在他们的身份中占了很大的比重。有些人断然拒绝他们邪恶的起源，但许多人自豪地与之和谐相处，愿意探索他们独特特征的各个方面。这种开放的态度产生了一种大胆的、不受约束的饮食习惯，这种饮食习惯往往是不可接近的，有时对不熟悉的人来说是危险的。他们擅长的一道菜是火香深渊鸡（一种原产于深渊和阿弗纳斯的鸟类魔物，味道类似于肥鸡），或者火香的任何东西，因为他们对热的天然抵抗力使他们处理香料的能力也得到增强。火焰舔过的肉串蘸上辛辣的胡椒釉，创造出这些带有严重刺激的烤肉串。

recipeFluff.name: Fire-Wrapped Golden Fish
entries: While Sigil's Great Bazaar is perhaps the most famous market in the known multiverse—a vibrant conflux of cultures and cuisines—this self-proclaimed "city at the center of the multiverse" also boasts countless storefronts and street bazaars, offering equally rare and exciting gastronomy. Fire-Wrapped Golden Fish is one such inexpensive delicacy, readily acquired in the Lower Ward or the more destitute Hive Ward. As quick to fry as it is to consume, this chili-and-cayenne-tinged, batter-fried white fish is a feast for the taste buds. Best served sizzling-hot, straight from the pan, wrapped in locally cultivated lettuce or a flatbread for easy ingestion en route to the next plane.

recipeFluff.name: Fried Bread and Spices
entries: Some believe that everything is better fried. Whether or not you agree, you wouldn't want to miss out on Fried Bread and Spices available at most taverns in the Lower Ward of Sigil. A popular breakfast staple on the planets Oerth, Toril, and Krynn, it is often served with poached eggs. The version most common in the City of Doors includes a unique seasoning mixture that borrows from all of them, with hints of cumin, coriander, cayenne, and even fennel. Whatever is in it, it's sure to brighten your meal, your day, and your journey onto the next plane.

recipeFluff.name: Fried Fingers
entries: 这道菜是由萨尔马什的蜥蜴人推广的，他们通常用人形部位代替家禽来制作，这些多汁的面包条为 "手指食物 "一词赋予了新的含义。今天，这个食谱在多元宇宙的所有文明地区都有供应，特点是用当地的鸡肉制成的条状物，卷在非传统的调味面包中，烤得很脆，并与矮人芥末、铁弗林番茄糖浆或温暖的梅子蘸酱一起食用。如果你有机会尝试原味，肥美的半身人手指最合适。

recipeFluff.name: Fried Soy with Vegetables
entries: This soy-based protein dish originated from a gnome recipe, but it is equally popular with those who shy away from animal meat, including some communities of elves. It is also ideal in environments where livestock is harder to keep, such as the Underdark and the Rock of Bral. The original gnome version uses chicken broth as a base, but vegetable broths work just as well. While the tofu is the star, the mélange of scallions, bok choy, bell pepper, and carrots imparts a variety of textures and flavors. Rice-based cooking wine and soy sauce make it a lustrous and savory meal.

recipeFluff.name: Gingerbread Man
entries: 这种姜饼人是在灰鹰的Sunsebb月的微弱光线下提供的传统食物，这种风格的姜饼人是为了纪念关于灰鹰城堡的古老遗迹的一个传说。据说，在那里，各种糖果都能活过来，骚扰冒险者，包括一种可怕的饼干，这种饼干的描述启发了这个食谱。姜饼人的胳膊和腿是用糖衣包裹的，但身体却被切碎的坚果和葡萄干所覆盖，成为一件保护性的盔甲。把最丰满的葡萄干串起来可以立即杀死这个恶魔，所以通常为饼干的嘴保留一个肥大的葡萄干。按照惯例，孩子们会先摘下那颗葡萄干吃掉，以确保饼干不会活过来!

recipeFluff.name: Goldenstars
entries: As you step onto the docks of Berdusk, the Jewel of the Vale—perhaps fresh off one of the many boats that ply the River Chionthar—there's a good chance the first thing you'll eat will be a goldenstar. These rich little pastries, traditionally stuffed with a local chicken sausage and Goldenfields batatas and leeks, are known for their distinctive triangular shape. Vendors sell them everywhere, and their heartiness will tide you over until you can manage a sit-down meal. Varieties of the goldenstar have spread throughout the Sword Coast, from the river's end at Baldur's Gate to as far north as Neverwinter. But every time you eat one done right, you'll be brought back to the docks of Berdusk.

recipeFluff.name: Goodberry Blend
entries: 在德鲁伊或游侠的剧目中，很少有法术能像适时地施放 "好浆果 "那样方便或有营养的。一颗 "好浆果"，通过汲取自然界本身的神圣精华而转化，可以为冒险者提供一整天的营养；有些人还表示它们具有神奇的治疗特性。但是，尽管有任何德鲁伊的传说或魔法，有一件事是肯定的：这种由绿色精华、香蕉片、蜂蜜和一小撮盐提升的健康的田野浆果混合物，将为任何人提供开始一天的旅程所需的重要必需品。

recipeFluff.name: Green Dragon Blackbread Muffins
entries: Blackbread is a palm-size circular loaf of pumpernickel that demands to be served warm and topped with sweet butter. A base of stone-ground cornmeal, dark rye flour, and a dash of unsweetened cocoa bolster the dark colors and texture. Buttermilk, molasses, and dark brown sugar round out this versatile bread with an almost honeyed nuance, which dips nicely in surplus gravy. You aren't doing it right unless a sizable slab of salted yak butter or the like is slathered on top to melt into its deep, dark nooks. A fancier version, usually served as a meal in itself, has currants or dried fruits rolled in, providing an even chewier and heartier experience. Blackbread is often sold in loaves by the bunch, but they are equally delectable in a portable muffin form, as they are served at the Green Dragon Inn in the Free City of Greyhawk. Blackbread's versatility makes it a great day starter reheated in a skillet, with—you guessed it—additional butter glistening atop. A notable version of this exists in loaf form in Saltmarsh and its nautical outskirts. In truth, whether eaten from a loaf or as a muffin, it's a classic and frugal dark bread that finds its way into many a larder.

recipeFluff.name: Green Ice Rime
entries: These chilly, wobbly, delicious squares of bright green jelly have become popular anywhere the people of the multiverse might need a refreshing and whimsical dessert, including the Rock of Bral where the natural refrigeration of Realmspace makes preparation a cinch. They are most often served in saucers on a bed of ice to keep them the ideal temperature. They have been nicknamed "the Gelatinous Cube" by some adventurers and there are confectioners who will suspend little candy swords or shields in the mix as a crunchy surprise that hits you right in the sweet tooth. The best part is that Green Ice Rime dissolves in your tummy...not the other way around.

recipeFluff.name: Green Onion Pancakes
entries: When the great floating enclaves of the Netheril Empire came crashing down, so, too, did their culinary secrets. But one community survived by escaping to the Shadowfell, and with it one of their most prized recipes was preserved: Green Onion Pancakes. While the Netherese, now known as the shadowstuff-infused Shadovar, have changed much over the centuries, this spectacular dish hasn't. These allium-based pancakes are an inexpensive and unexpectedly filling treat that pairs easily with savory roast meats. They're also delicious served solo, when dolloped with fresh cream and pureed fig spread for a uniquely Netherese experience. In many regions, scallions are an equally acceptable base vegetable that offers a pancake with a milder flavor. Regardless of how one chooses to consume this pan-fried appetizer, the culinary experience is one of the few good reasons to come to the Shadowfell.

recipeFluff.name: Greenspear Bundles in Bacon
entries: 绿豆，也被人类称为芦笋或 "麻雀草"，是一种多年生的花卉植物，在许多精灵的饮食中已经上升到主食的地位。当精灵们生吃、调味、烘烤或用草药蒸煮油菜时，他们的半精灵兄弟--从某些烹饪禁忌中解放出来--已经开发出一种额外的准备技术。为了尊重半人的味蕾，半精灵在混合中加入盐渍和腌制的猪肉，这是一种不敬的做法，但也是对油梨的一种补充。关于培根，总是切得越厚越好。

recipeFluff.name: Gully Dwarf Homestyle Porridge
entries: 如果你曾经参加过沟渠矮人的用餐，你可能只参加过一次。作为居住在地下空间最深处、最黑暗、最肮脏的地方的拾荒者，他们的用餐习惯并不十分高雅。但如果全盘否定他们的美食，那就是把婴儿和洗澡水一起扔掉了（据说山沟里的矮人偶尔会喝水）。传统的谷地矮人粥需要的是一种颗粒状的炖品，里面充满了......你不会想知道的。然而，他们更文明的矮人表亲已经开发了他们自己的早饭菜肴，巧妙地取笑了不可食用的原始菜肴。他们的版本，也被称为 "肮脏的粥"，包括一个奶油燕麦片式的基础，其中充满了红枣、切碎的坚果、黑糖和一定量的奶油。矮人甚至被称为酿制咸味的 "山沟矮人粥"，其中包含吃剩的香肠碎片、熏肉脂肪条纹和切碎的葱花，并加入砂砾式 "肉汤"。无论你吃哪个版本，这种来自克莱恩世界的粥对你的味蕾来说是一次真正的随机相遇。
Six gully dwarves trailed after them, carrying heavy pots of what smelled like oatmeal

recipeFluff.name: Gurdats
entries: 如果你喜欢蘑菇和奶酪，那么这道菜就很适合你! Gurdats是许多剑海岸酒馆菜单上普遍存在的一种廉价而又饱满的配菜。这道开胃菜 "在野外 "的一些最好的例子是在埃尔图勒的 "一对黑鹿角"（A Pair of Black Antlers）找到的，它没有回避奶酪，或者是在塞孔伯的 "七弦琴"（The Seven-Stringed Harp），那里的厨师在胡椒香料上大做文章，但没有盖过大地的真菌味道。下面介绍的版本是对这种旅行者主食的经典诠释。

recipeFluff.name: Halfling Game Birds
entries: Halflings may be small, but their love of fine food is known to be grand. It follows, then, that one of their most prized dishes would be correspondingly small of size but big on flavor, and such is the case with the dish called Halfling Game Birds. Rubbed with a secret mixture of rosemary, thyme, and lemon zest, these tasty Cornish hens are left to marinate overnight, testing the patience of many a halfling chef. When the waiting is over (almost never as long as is recommended), the birds are finally roasted at a scorching high heat to hasten them to the table where they never last long in front of eager diners. Whether Oerth, Toril, Eberron, or Krynn, these little game birds rule the roost on halfling tables across the multiverse.

recipeFluff.name: Halfling Iron Rations
entries: Braving the dead wastes of the Shadowfell demands great preparation and fortitude. The endless gloom is unforgiving and yields little in the way of natural edible resources. Travelers would be wise to foreplan their meals and carry all required consumables with them. The iron rations prepared by Gloomwrought's surprisingly sizable halfling population are a notable and cost-effective trail treat. This creative medley of crushed nuts, local oats, and crunchy seeds are clumped into tiny balls and cemented with honey. And they are as packed with nutrients as they are yummy. Even when you're not embarking on an arduous, despair-filled journey, this granola makes for a nourishing, delectable snack that balances the sweet and savory.

recipeFluff.name: Halfling Oatmeal Sweet Nibbles
entries: 燕麦、巧克力片和黄油饼干的密度很高，这些小巧的饼干很适合半身人的手......以及每个人的胃。秘诀是在每批饼干完成烹调前一分钟将其从烤箱中取出，让它们在托盘上完成，以确保其外部是金色的，核心是超粘的。事实上，这些零食是半身人在餐桌上寻找的一切：丰富、美味的味道和快速的准备（正好赶上喝茶的时间！）。

recipeFluff.name: Hand Pies
entries: 这些手掌大小的糕点是你能得到的最接近酒馆主食的东西。从一个城镇到另一个城镇，你可以发现它们被塞进各种各样的材料，从鹿肉或鸡肉糜到牛肉、薄荷羊肉或孔雀肉（不过通常只是用前一餐的剩菜）。手抓饼有多种形式和口味，特别适合旅行，使其成为适合冒险者的食物。下面介绍的这个品种是位于沃特德普贸易区的卡特尔肉馅饼，它以培根和韭菜为原料，在心脏地带、山谷，甚至法鲁恩北部的野蛮海岸都非常受欢迎，饥饿的冒险者根本吃不够。

recipeFluff.name: Hardbuckler Stew
entries: 如果你走在有围墙的地精小镇哈德巴克勒的街道上，它位于博德之门以东几周的商队，你很有可能会完全错过真正的城市。虽然古朴的乡村小屋被狭窄的人行道连接起来，但真正的行动是在他们宽敞的地窖里，这些地窖可以延伸到地下三层。地精居民通过作为地下通道的隧道连接起来，在这些舒适的、有炉火的地下空间里经营着商店、旅店和酒馆。在这里你可以找到该镇的特色美食。哈德巴克勒炖菜。通常用土豆、蘑菇、地衣、萝卜和各种肉类（从家禽和山羊到鼩鼱和田鼠）烹制，这种泥土味和芳香味的炖菜能满足所有的需要。虽然在这个精心设计的地下城市的每一个机构都会告诉你，他们准备的是 "正确的方法"，但这个特殊版本的食谱要求使用羊肉，并为小地精的嘴巴切得很细。

recipeFluff.name: Harengon Coffee Carrots
entries: Nothing says {@i harvest} like the colorful dish known as Harengon Coffee Carrots. An unexpected journey of flavors, fresh wild-picked carrots are simmered with mountain-grown {@recipe kaeth|HFFotM} (or coffee) and a generous amount of beet-derived molasses. A touch of thyme and finely aged balsamic vinegar round out this sweet and acidic treat, so perfectly balanced that even the eladrin of the Feywild often include it as a staple of their elaborate forest feasts. The harengon, rabbit-like denizens of the Feywild, famously prepare this dish with a veritable rainbow of orange, red, white, yellow, and purple carrots, emphasizing presentation as much as flavor. The inspired infusion of coffee provides a robust tang that will also add zip to anyone's step, especially the harengon who are known for their exuberance. When it comes to the serving table, this vibrant fall side is bound to bring you back for more.

recipeFluff.name: Harmonious Barracks Meatloaf
entries: If you intend to police the chaotic streets of Sigil, it's best not to do it on an empty stomach. The warriors of the Harmonium are deeply dedicated to keeping order but are perhaps not so adventuresome in their tastes, so this rich, filling meal-in-itself will keep a soldier on the march for hours on end. Heaps of it are hot and plentiful in their barracks in the Lady's Ward. To maximize its proteins, this dish includes not just lamb but a medley of meats, which gives it its distinctive, hearty flavor. Ironically, a certain quantity of this meatloaf somehow finds its way into the hands of street vendors—this is, after all, a town where everyone finds a way to turn a quick profit.

recipeFluff.name: Heartlands Rose Apple and Blackberry Pie
entries: 故事是这样的：一个饥饿的半身人从她的山坡上散步回来，带着一篮子脆生生的玫瑰苹果和丰满的黑莓。在典型的优柔寡断的半身人方式中，她无法决定用哪一种来填满她的馅饼......所以她选择了两种，于是这个传奇的半身人甜点馅饼诞生了。厚厚的手工饼皮和薄薄的黄油面覆盖着酸甜可口的玫瑰苹果（几乎任何苹果都可以，当然要看季节）和黑莓馅，还有香料的点缀。一些半身人甚至在他们的面包皮上撒上白色的切达奶酪，融化后会有一种独特的味道，但他们都同意，如果没有一勺新鲜打发的甜奶油，这将是一种罪恶。

recipeFluff.name: High Harvest Puree
entries: 丰收节是托里尔某些地区每年在秋分附近举行的庆祝丰收和富足的活动。在过去的日子里，传统规定精灵们只吃自然界的露水以示感谢；然而，近年来，这个节日已经演变成了一个以秋日主题菜肴为主的多道菜的盛宴，包括一种温暖舒适的作物植物混合物。这道营养丰富的泥浆是木精灵和精灵的最爱，是南瓜、大蒜和百里香的混合体，经过慢火煨制，具有甜味和泥土味，并以橄榄油作为点缀。

recipeFluff.name: Hogs in Bedrolls
entries: 很少有东西能让半身人如沐春风，新鲜出炉的黄油香肠的香味在村庄里飘荡。半身人好奇心强，而且足智多谋，他们擅长将自己喜欢吃的东西进行新的烹饪组合--在这种情况下，咸味香肠和薄片糕点。小巧的烟熏猪肉和牛肉香肠被紧紧地卷在咸面团的 "床单 "上，直到只有 "头 "露出来。专家的做法是，在将这些小点心放入烤箱之前，先用薄薄的蛋液刷一下，以确保它们的光泽和颜色的提升。一旦它们被烤熟，再涂上黄油就是真正的美味了。床单上的猪可能是任何规模的半身人聚会的完美手指食物。

recipeFluff.name: Hommlet Golden Brown Roasted Turkey with Sausage Stuffing and Drippings
entries: 除了在敞开的壁炉上方的烤架上烤着一只丰满的鸟，还有什么能让人流口水？这道菜的一个特殊风格是在霍姆雷特村出名的，该村位于灰鹰城Nyr Dyv的远处，那里的鹅在温暖的月份非常多，火鸡在冬天也非常多。这只火鸡配上用鸟的汁液制成的厚厚的肉汁，并充满了熏肉。香肠馅由煎过的辛辣猪肉、调味的白面包片、切碎的洋葱和小块的芹菜组成，全部折在温汤中。在霍姆雷特，一整只火鸡只需花上一块金子，但吃多了火鸡会像适时的睡眠咒语一样让你心烦意乱，所以最好还是坚持吃腿。

recipeFluff.name: Honey Milk
entries: Frequently enjoyed by the Shadovar as a nightcap or a light dessert, honey milk is traditionally a stand-alone beverage that can be served chilled, warm, or even as toddy, spiked with herbal liqueur (as it is frequently done in the Shadowfell's forsaken city of Gloomwrought). While the preparation of honey milk is quite simple, the best versions balance a modest amount of honey with the freshest dairy (often imported from the Prime Material Plane) to produce a hearty yet refreshing drink served to all ages. However, the true key to properly preparing honey milk is patience. Traditionally, shadovar alchemists allow the mixture to marinate and cool for several hours before serving, and often include a garnish of cinnamon or citrus to make an attractive presentation for this lovely libation. Its elixir-like qualities are whispered to be good on the gut.

recipeFluff.name: Honey-Drizzled Cream Puffs
entries: 这些美味的点心填满了香草奶油冻，当之无愧地成为了从安恩到永冬以及其他地方的每一个半身人的甜点。酥脆的空心酥饼可以提前几天准备好，光是这一点就已经是一种享受了，但是对于吉士馅料来说，就更不用说了--奶油、香草和蜂蜜的密集、天鹅绒般的混合。虽然这种奶油冻是一种美妙的馅料或任何甜点的顶部，最好用直头糕点袋来做，但用勺子吃也是非常正常的（或据说是这样）。如果你不在这些泡芙上滴上当地的优质蜂蜜，你就做错了。

recipeFluff.name: Honeyed Ham with Pineapple Gravy
entries: 当节日盛宴来临的时候，蜂蜜火腿是半身人烤箱里的第一道菜。一条大火腿在放入烤箱之前，会被刷上一层又一层的当地蜂蜜、红糖和菠萝汁釉，以获得最大的甜度。当慢炖猪肉的香味充斥着整个家园时，半身人就开始制作附带的菠萝肉汁，这是一种厚重而浓郁的酱汁，可以将你的野兽和淀粉淹没其中。应该指出的是，如果你想抓野猪的话，这个食谱也可以和野猪一起吃。

recipeFluff.name: Hot River Crab Bites
entries: A center of music and the arts, the town of Berdusk, in Faerûn's western heartlands, is known for many things, but above all for its hot river crabs. A specialty of the Sign of the Silver Sword Inn, these river delicacies are as dependent on freshness as on seasoning. Traditionally, locals would harvest crabs with soft shells and consume them within the day. As for the crab recipe, it's a closely guarded secret, but is believed to include crème fraîche and lemon zest mixed into a spread and served on endive. At only one copper piece per plate, they'll leave enough in your coinpurse for a glass of {@recipe Saerloonian Glowfire|HFFotM}—the perfect complement.

recipeFluff.name: Hot Spiced Cider
entries: 热的五香苹果酒是一种必不可少的季节性饮料，对所有在一天的旅行后寻求温暖的液体庇护的人都有吸引力。新鲜压榨的苹果酒，通常在集市或农场以壶为单位出售，在小火或火炉上熬制，加入五香粉、丁香、红糖和一阵橘子，然后浇上鲜奶油和肉桂棒。半身人提供他们自己的特殊品种，名为Moonslake，一种薄荷味的酒精苹果鸡尾酒，与煮沸并过滤的薄荷碎水混合，产生一种咬人的清凉回味（人类往往不喜欢）。精灵们把它准备得很干净，通常是用干酪布过滤，以获得精致的、玻璃般的琥珀色外观。矮人并不挑剔，他们只是喜欢加料。无论你的偏好如何，请品尝一下这些凉爽天气的混合物，让你从内到外感到温暖。

recipeFluff.name: Irlymeyer's Dragonfire Punch
entries: The golden rule with any good tavern punch is that, when going down, it should feel like you were struck by a physical one and make you more inclined to throw one. Such is the case with the potent potable sometimes called Irlymeyer's Dragonfire Punch. A creation of the mysterious mixologist for whom the drink is named, and perfected by Otik Sandath of the Inn of the Last Home, this refreshing beverage is chock-full of domestic and imported juices from across Krynn, including cranberry, orange, and pineapple. The "punch" comes from the generous amounts of brandy and sparkling wine. Originally named for its use of poisonous dragon's rose blossoms, the recipe has changed significantly over the years, but its effect upon patrons has not.

recipeFluff.name: Iron Rations
entries: 如果没有一些基本的东西，你在多元宇宙的任何地方都坚持不了多久：一把可靠的剑、一个装满水的皮囊和一些铁质口粮。有时也被称为 "旅行食品"，这种主食为各种冒险者提供必要的营养，从安萨隆经受考验的旅行者到弗拉纳斯的地牢探险者。虽然成分经常因地区而异，但这些口粮往往重量轻，蛋白质含量高，并能在路上持续数天甚至数周，其特点是原料包括腌肉、干果、坚果和奶酪以及饼干、脆皮或硬面包。祝你顺利，吃得好，公平的冒险家。

recipeFluff.name: Kaeth
entries: Kaeth, or coffee, is an aromatic brew made from ground roasted beans and is famous for its invigorating properties, making it a prevalent day starter throughout the worlds of the multiverse. In Sigil, the City of Doors, planar sightseers can sample from a wide array of coffee beans and beverages from countless planets. Kaeth, as it is commonly called on the planet Toril, has developed into quite the delicacy along the Sword Coast, where it is now imported in droves. In the nation of Sembia, a popular method of preparation features a blend of melted chocolate and liquor. In some areas, kaeth is so popular that it has become more profitable than the tea trade. The peoples of the planet Krynn drink tarbean tea and kefre, both of which are derived from vibrant, dark-roasted beans and frequently served black. In contrast, citizens of the Outer Planes imbibe numerous spiced and creamed variants of kaeth, including the notable Mountain Majesty of Mount Celestia. On the planet Oerth, coffee trends more acidic and is frequently blended into creamy liquors to grant an extra kick. But perhaps the most notable, kav'la, in which creamed coconut milk is swirled into a malted, dark, nutty roast, is served in tall, ornate ceramic vessels and is easily found in the cultured bazaars of Sigil. Regardless of which varietal you choose, kaeth, in its endless forms, serves as a caffeine-infused pick-me-up, whether on the trail or in the safe confines of one's homestead.

recipeFluff.name: Kara-Tur Noodles
entries: 在托里尔星球上，很少有国家像寿隆人类帝国那样强大或有影响力，它位于卡拉图尔的广大地区。虽然这个地区拥有独特的宗教和自豪的文化，但它也拥有同样强大的烹饪传统。虽然剑海岸的城邦与卡拉图尔之间的互动或冲突稀少，但其许多茶叶，如淡玉、菲姆菲姆、龙眼和龙井，都是由法鲁尼亚商人大量进口的，某些菜肴，包括各种面条，也是经过长期的西迁。虽然你不会在任何一家酒馆的菜单上找到这种炒菜的主菜，但它已经进入了水底世界等文化中心的更现代的食堂。一大碗面条在油淋淋的锅里快速煮熟，再加上大块的鸡肉、蔬菜和咸味的酱油或Garum（一种鱼酱），已经成为剑海岸传统烤肉和汤的流行变化。

recipeFluff.name: Kender Loaf
entries: Kender loaf, or raston pastry as it has been called, is a filling, raisin-specked dessert to round out a hearty meal. However, in its earlier incarnations, raston pastry dated back to the first Dragon War, when not even scraps of stale bread could be discarded. Crusts of stale bread were habitually tossed into a basin and later mashed to create livestock feed, but the kender saw an opportunity. Stale bread was separated from other half-finished morsels; soaked in water; sugared, spiced, and dried; then served up as what was known as kender loaf, the pre-owned bread. So popular was kender loaf that the process was refined with eggs, cream, and spices, evolving into the bread puddings we know today.

recipeFluff.name: Kender Stumblenoodles
entries: Kender legends have a way of shifting and swaying merrily with the tides of the Blood Sea of Istar. An early tale held that kender stumblenoodles were born of a collision between two frantic kender cooks—when their pots mixed, it resulted in an unexpected alliance of flavors and ingredients. However, ask a kender adventurer, and you may as likely hear a yarn concerning a well-placed insult aimed toward a draconian corporal and his squad. As the bold kender scoundrel made haste to flee, he frantically threw about any valuables behind him to dissuade his pursuers. In his desperation, he ejected a small sack of mixed spices, hardened cheese, a jar of mustard, and several handfuls of uncooked spiral pasta shells that, as kender luck would have it, served as a meal of caltrops for draconian toes and sent the kender's pursuers stumbling into the mud. In honor of this brave kender's sacrifice (the loss of a perfectly good sack of pasta), kender across Krynn have memorialized the occasion in classic, good-humored kender fashion.

recipeFluff.name: Kendermore Cobbler
entries: Nothing warms the soul quite like the scent of a freshly baked kender cobbler. The flavor of this effervescent blend of peaches, dark berries, vanilla, cloves, and liquor (for the brave, a sizable enough dash to make your toes tingle) is as fascinating as the diminutive folk who invented it. Kender—said to be birthed of magic and chaos—approach food in much the same manner as they traverse the worlds of the multiverse: adventurously. The buttery, flaky topping oozing with soft, chopped peaches should be enough, but when combined with blueberries, the cobbler filling brightens in a curiously kender way. This dessert is especially popular on Mid-year Day in Sixthmonth, which also happens to be Peach Month in Ansalon, but it remains the dessert of choice for the kender of Krynn regardless of holiday or season. Often served as a cobbler, sometimes as a crumble, but never to be skipped, especially when offered warm with a hefty dollop of fresh whipped cream.

recipeFluff.name: Laumberry Pie
entries: The Yawning Portal of Waterdeep serves a new pie every week, based on the seasonal ingredients available. You're really in luck when laumberries from the frosty Frozenfar are in season. Their tartness is softened by the sweetness of the dough, making it the perfect blend of flavors. The famous tavern likely pilfered the idea from the hardy bakers of Bryn Shander. Pies in this style are made off-season with blueberries, blackberries, and raspberries, which together give you something of the flavor of the original. They're best served a bit chilled, and when done right have been known to resurrect the spirits of weary adventurers emerging from the Undermountain.

recipeFluff.name: Lluirwood Salad
entries: 沿着前半身人国家Luiren的北部边界，是Faerûn东南部的Lluirwood。这片茂密的林地有时被称为 "长林"，因为它的面积很长，是三群半身人的故乡，他们曾经在茂密的树叶上觅食，寻找美味的森林食物。在印度鬼战之后，Lluirwood大部分被半身人遗弃，随后被从北方的Toadsquat山脉游荡而来的脾气不好的怪物们所居住。但是，即使在几代人之后，来自卢伊恩沿海城市的饥饿的莱茵人仍然渴望那些美味的森林风味，并向冒险者支付丰厚的费用来提取其成分。在淹没整个卢瓦尔的法术瘟疫之前，这种由全叶菠菜、小红莓干、蜜饯核桃和春日奶酪组成的香甜可口的沙拉，再加上浓郁的油醋汁，将成为从贝鲁尔到舒恩的酒馆的主要菜单，是第一或第二场晚宴的完美开胃菜。

recipeFluff.name: Loaf Pudding
entries: The Elfsong Tavern of Baldur's Gate is known for many things: the disembodied singing voice of an elven maiden for which the tavern is named; the stuffed baby beholder over the mantle; and the driftglobe-lit taproom. But there is no better reason to visit this famous haven for adventurers than its delectable Loaf Pudding. A specialty of halfling head-chef Chenna Fatrabbit and her human pastry sidekick, Klav Martilmur, this moist, yogurt-infused loaf is soaked in a delicious vanilla-almond syrup and topped with a sprinkle of salted almonds to add just the right amount of crunch. The dessert is so coveted that even Spelljammer pirates have occasionally dropped into port to bring a loaf or two back to Realmspace.

recipeFluff.name: Meal's End
entries: 浓浓的奶油、觅食的水果和压碎的黑酥皮组成了一种令人愉快的口味组合，提供了一种轻盈而多彩的餐后精灵甜点。精灵们并不颓废，因此并不以他们对甜点的烹饪能力而闻名，但这道清爽的菜很快就能调制出来，而且很容易一碗一碗地端上来，不需要烘烤。虽然根据地区和文化的不同，"餐末 "有一些微妙的变化，但用切碎的柿子或李子代替野果的版本是相当有感觉的，因此推荐。

recipeFluff.name: Melted Cheeses with Chunky Tomato Broth
entries: 半身人不仅了解他们的奶酪，他们还拥有无数种准备奶酪的方法。面包外面涂上黄油，上面铺上奶酪条，撒上调料，然后煎一下，再切成条状，或者叫 "蘸酱"，用来灌汤。食谱本身很简单（实际上只是一个吃更多奶酪的借口）! 这些三明治有时会有辣味，通常会加入莳萝、肉豆蔻、罗勒或类似的东西，这取决于厨师的心情。配套的汤也是如此，通常是大块的西红柿，但偶尔也有光滑的红辣椒泥。它总是热着喝，更多的是作为一种蘸酱，一旦奶酪消失，就可以大口大口地喝。作为半身人食谱中最简单的午间食谱之一，融化的奶酪也被各地的人类大量采用，这道菜成为无数酒馆菜单的装饰。

recipeFluff.name: Miner's Pie
entries: 矿工馅饼，有时被人类和半身人称为 "牧羊人馅饼"，对于我们所有人中不知疲倦的侏儒来说，这是真正丰盛的一站式膳食。碎牛肉（或羊肉或鹿肉）、甜玉米、豌豆、洋葱和韭菜被土豆泥包裹着，上面还有奶酪。这是整个法鲁恩的旅馆中为数不多的矮人菜肴之一，特别是那些北方和心脏地带的旅馆，可能是因为人类的变体在很大程度上借鉴了这个矮人的经典。

recipeFluff.name: Mingari-Spiced Owlbear Milk
entries: While conventionally prepared with a base of {@creature owlbear|MM} milk, other types of milk such as yak milk, buttermilk, rice milk, and even nut milk are all suitable substitutes in this creamy, cozy concoction. But no matter which milk you choose, there is no alternative for Mingari spice, culled from the inner bark of Mingari trees. Likened in both flavor and scent to cinnamon, Mingari spice is a rare but highly sought-after seasoning indigenous to southeast Faerûn. Although rare, this strong, aromatic spice is incredibly versatile, at home in both sweet and savory dishes, and thus it has spread throughout the Realms and beyond. However, satisfying Mingari-Spiced Owlbear Milk requires merely a dash of this scarce but potent accent. Travelers in search of a day starter, an alcohol-infused night capper, or even a medicinal stomach soother, invariably relish a tall mug of this nourishing milk.

recipeFluff.name: Moonshae Seafood Rice
entries: 这道奶油鱼饭起源于神话中的精灵岛Evermeet，但在剑海岸及其分散的群岛上被富有冒险精神的侨民所推广，这道菜需要一个有耐心的厨师......但它非常值得等待 短粒米（产生更粘稠、更紧凑的质地），以及各种海洋 "水果"，包括虾和扇贝，在丰富的海鲜汤中慢煮，直到达到光滑、天鹅绒般的稠度。黄油、洋葱、藏红花、精灵族的干白葡萄酒和橄榄油都交织在一起，为激活梦幻般的海洋风味尽一份力量。一些古老的精灵厨师会在这道菜的最后加上一圈马斯卡彭奶酪。

recipeFluff.name: Mushroom Tea
entries: 当暗黑世界的炉火变暗时，众所周知，乌鸦会伸手去拿水壶--不是为了做任何草药茶，而是为了做饭后的煨蘑菇汤。如果他们能找到，乌鸦更喜欢松茸，尽管香菇或平菇在紧要关头也能做到。他们把切好的蘑菇放入用干海带调味的清汤中，有时加入鱼汤或酱油和酒精，并在茶壶中加热。他们从中倒出一小杯芳香的茶，慢慢地喝，直到蘑菇煮得很熟，这时就用一根细串来吃。

recipeFluff.name: Neverwinter Nectar
entries: Neverwinter nectar is an expensive but tasty spirit-based drink, known for its sweet fruit-infused flavor, buttery base, and citrus-tinged aftertaste. Perennially popular in Neverwinter, this "nectar" has gradually appeared on the drink lists of many of the finer eateries among the well-traveled cities of the Sword Coast. The surprisingly crisp and refreshing cocktail is so rich in flavor, it is often consumed in lieu of dessert or as an accompaniment to lighter fare. Veteran barkeeps unlock the full spectrum of flavors when they combine the unique mixture of juices, brandy, and white wine with a touch of sparkling water and ice. Felzoun's Folly, in Waterdeep, serves one of the more notable iterations of this syrupy and perfectly divine concoction.

recipeFluff.name: Onion Loaf
entries: The onion loaf on the menu at the Yawning Portal is done in the Cormyr style: big, dark loaves, as dense as the King's Forest. While the onion may be the headliner, the real stars of the show are the leeks, scallions, and fresh buttermilk, which help round out the flavors of this rich, crusty loaf—perfect for morningfeast or eveningfeast. When it's time to break bread with adventuring companions, old and new, an onion loaf is an inexpensive and delicious option that's practically a meal in itself.

recipeFluff.name: Orange Mountain Duck
entries: 矮人因其 "不甜的牙齿 "而广为人知，但这并不否认他们的好味道，南部法鲁尼亚的金矮人对橙色和柿子山鸭的喜爱就是证明。独特的酸辣酱使多汁的野味肉变得鲜亮，并产生了一种神圣的鸭皮待遇。也许多年来生活在人类附近使他们疲惫不堪，或者拓宽了他们的味觉，但据说现代的矮人实际上仅仅因为令人垂涎的脆皮而发生了争吵！这道菜可能不会成为次要菜肴。虽然这道菜可能不会在很久以前的地下宴会厅里出现，但它肯定会出现在今天的地面矮人菜单上。

recipeFluff.name: Ornabra
entries: Ornabra is a hearty meal and something of a badge of honor for those who have eaten it. This dish has been served for many generations by the hard-working denizens of Purskul (the "Granary City"), a bustling and notable caravan stop inland from Athkatla, between Amn's Cloud Peak and the Small Teeth mountains in West Faerûn. Lamb and potato stew is simmered for hours, then drained before being wrapped in thick and chewy flatbread the size of a small shield. As popular with Purskul's human constituents as with its sizable half-orc population, this street food is enough to fill a humanoid belly for two meals and is commonly scooped up by on-the-go, coin-conscious caravanners along the Southern Trade Way.

recipeFluff.name: Otik's Skillet-Fried Spiced Potatoes
entries: 这道著名的配菜由切碎的土豆组成，以香料和油炸的方式食用，源自奥蒂克-桑达斯的个人食谱，他是位于安萨隆一个叫索拉斯的偏远克莱恩城市的老板和厨师。欧提克个人对大蒜、辣椒、胡椒、卡宴和一大勺当地咸黄油的混合配料经常被模仿，但很难被打败；然而，人们普遍认为下面的食谱最接近于坐在著名的瓦伦林树酒馆顶上，手捧他自酿的黑啤酒的感觉。这些土豆可以与菜单上的任何红烧肉搭配，也可以与鸡蛋搭配，作为一天的开胃菜。

recipeFluff.name: Pan-Fried Knucklehead Trout
entries: 在冰风谷这个冰冻的苔原上，没有什么可看的，更没有什么可吃的......除非你知道去哪里找。在世界之脊的北面，隐藏在凯尔文之巢的风影中，有三个淡水湖，支撑着湖岸边的十个村庄--这个地区被称为十镇。十镇的湖泊并不起眼，只有一个特点：它们是唯一已知的传说中的节头鳟鱼的所在地。这些鱼因其厚厚的、指节状的头骨而得名，已成为该地区最有利可图的出口产品，不是因为它们的烹饪价值，而是因为当地工匠用象牙般的头骨制作的精巧的装饰品。来自卢斯坎和其他地方的商人为这些古玩支付了高价，这些古玩已经成为整个法鲁恩城市的热门。因此，十镇的湖泊经常被当地渔民为争夺当天的渔获而流下的鲜血染红。然而，在该地区以外鲜为人知的是，这些罕见的鱼和它们的价值一样美味，尤其是在用香葱、柠檬、盐、胡椒和辣椒粉煎制时。如果你不能从Ten Towns的湖泊中找到新鲜的节节鱼，不要沮丧。灰鹰城附近的Nyr Dyv或靠近索拉斯的Crystalmir湖的鳟鱼就可以作为替代品。

recipeFluff.name: Par-Salian's Tea
entries: 无论你是一个在艰苦的冒险之后脱下盔甲的战士，还是一个在书堆中学习之后放松的巫师，每一天都需要时间来休息。从晦涩的乌龙茶到普通的洋甘菊，茶叶对身体和灵魂都有不可思议的镇静和恢复作用。强大的白袍高阶法师帕-萨利安以他的奥术能力而闻名，但他身边的人也热情地讲述了他的强效茶叶自酿品。据了解，一碟满满的这种非凡的混合饮料，其中包括新鲜生姜、蜂蜜、洋甘菊、干柠檬、橘子皮和少许滑榆树皮（赋予它光滑、油腻的回味）等成分，据说甚至可以舒缓最顽固的感冒--这种效果确保了帕尔-萨利安最著名的学生之一雷斯林-马耶尔的生存。帕尔-萨利安的传奇之茶在整个克莱恩仍然很受欢迎，有些版本还加入了来自埃斯特维尔德荆棘丛的罕见的迷幻贝加尔种子，不过据说除了他最信任的学生之外，没有人能够成功复制他的草药混合物。

Par-Salian opened his mouth to speak, then realized Highmage Astathan was studying him very intently. He closed his mouth again. The tea lingered with a slightly oily aftertaste on his tongue, and Par-Salian finally recognized it. It was bekial seed from the thorn bushes of Estwilde; it acted to open one's consciousness without the deleterious effects of most other opiates. A little was enough to put its user in a trance. Too much was toxic. And the fine line between the two was only drawn by master herbologists.

recipeFluff.name: Plate of Silver
entries: In the Faerûnian land of Amn, there is a charming, well-appointed inn called Stargath House, which is known for a signature baked-potato-and-anchovy dish called the Plate of Silver. The meal is thusly named as consolation and warning to those who would sate their appetites by seeking the fabled treasures reputed to be hidden in an extensive network of booby-trapped and haunted cellars underneath the inn. The treasured gold is said to rattle inside the chest plates of {@creature helmed horror|MM|helmed horrors} that seek to claim the lives of trespassers. Many a guest has disobeyed the firm guidance of the courteous waitstaff and gone missing. It is tradition that when the unique delicacy is served, the staff and regulars of Stargath House rattle their gold coins inside tumblers as a way of presenting the recipient of Stargath hospitality with a choice: "Would you risk a cold and bitter death for the promise of haunted gold? Or would you kindly settle for a warm, tasty plate of silver, instead?" Both the dish and tradition have somehow found their way to Krynn, even though Stargath House is nowhere to be found on the planet.

recipeFluff.name: Plate-of-Gold
entries: 矮人并不以吃蔬菜而闻名，但当蔬菜被浸泡在咸的、金色的面糊中，并被油炸至酥脆时，他们就会对它们爱不释手了！这就是 "黄金酱"。不要忘了在完成这些油炸美食时浇上 "黄金酱"--一种带着柑橘味的糖浆、甜味糖果。这道菜在地表矮人中特别受欢迎，因为他们有更多机会获得新鲜农产品和根茎类蔬菜。

recipeFluff.name: Potato Leek Soup
entries: 矮人土豆韭菜汤是法鲁恩的主食，是一种坚固的开胃菜，凡人可以忍受它的厚度。这种浓密而富有营养的混合蔬菜一年四季都可以食用，是温暖矮人的四肢和灵魂的最佳选择，因为他们要经受潮湿的地下生活的无情寒冷。懒洋洋地舀进超大的蛋壳里，在充分预期第二（和第三）的情况下大量准备，它是为了满足疲惫的战士或不知疲倦的矿工的无底饥饿。诸如切碎的葱、韭菜和培根等配料是不会出错的!

recipeFluff.name: Potion of Restoration
entries: 每个冒险家都需要不时地提神，而没有什么能比 "恢复之药 "更能解渴和缓解疼痛了。果味和甜味，带有黑莓和柠檬的味道，杜松子酒隐藏起来，直到你已经感觉到它在你肚子里的火焰。酒吧老板给它加了一撮蝴蝶豆，使它呈现出独特的蓝色--在灯光昏暗的地牢里，你甚至会把它误认为是它神奇的名字。但话又说回来，如果你喝够了这些酒，你将不知道痛苦和恐惧......尽管你可能也不会进行任何光荣的壮举。

recipeFluff.name: Purple Grapemash No. 3
entries: Barovia is known for many things, its wine among them. The Wizard of Wines Vineyard is legendary for producing some of the finest wines throughout the planes and multiverse, such as the full-bodied Red Dragon Crush and the crisp Champagne du le Stomp. But not all wines that emerge from the mists of Barovia are of equal quality, as evidenced by the existence of Purple Grapemash No. 3. Priced at only three copper pieces per pint at most local taverns and other Domains of Dread, this table wine is known to be spectacularly unremarkable. However, in some areas of the Shadowfell, clever mixologists have added copious amounts of ice and lime juice to the pungent grape-ish mix, turning this otherwise mediocre concoction into a refreshing, slushy treat worth at least four copper pieces anywhere.

recipeFluff.name: Qualinesti Vegetable Stew
entries: 在克莱恩的世界里，在古代弑君者战争之后不久，王子基斯-卡南向他的兄弟西塔斯国王呼吁获得西部的主权。他的哥哥和平地授予西部精灵从希尔瓦内斯蒂国家独立出来。然而，西部精灵的新国王基斯-卡南却遭遇了数十年的散居生活带来的艰难困苦。在他们的首都奎里诺斯特建立之前，他的精灵族人一直在努力寻找新的生活方式，靠土地生存。几种简单而简陋的饭菜进入了精灵族的饮食食谱，包括 "丰收奖"，一种精心准备的烘烤蔬菜砂锅。茄子、西葫芦、黄瓜和西红柿等可获得的农产品被切成薄片，然后在新鲜的罗勒和西红柿（压成酱）上叠成扇形，然后在烤之前淋上新鲜和芳香的油。这道简陋而丰富的菜肴可以用很少的成本养活整个精灵村。虽然克莱恩的精灵们现在一年四季都在准备这道菜的变体，并通过灵感的替换来驾驭季节，但下面的组合是最经典的，也是最值得推荐的。

recipeFluff.name: Quij's Plate
entries: Quij's Plate, consisting of pan-fried sausage, twice-browned potatoes, and eggs, is a filling meal that infallibly populates the menus of countless caravan cooks. Easy to prepare on the road for large parties, it has also become a popular dish in the military for its simplicity and heartiness to help soldiers brave the endless grey days. Named after an orc henchman of Lord Robilar, who inventively cooked this sausage meal for his adventuring party, using his shield for a skillet, Quij's Plate would eventually earn its place on the menu of the famed Green Dragon Inn, nestled in the Free City of Greyhawk's bustling River Quarter. The unusual name has since become the catch-all term for the countless iterations of this sausage-and-potato-based campfire classic, including those that migrated to misty Barovia via lost and hungry adventurers.

recipeFluff.name: Quith-pa
entries: 虽然它可能无法满足半身人的胃口，但quith-pa已经维持了几代精灵冒险家的身体。作为精灵族最常见的铁质口粮，这种素食性食物主要由干果组成，但地区性变化也包括种子、坚果、豆类等。这种基本的营养品被设计成在背包里和在身体里一样轻，确保旅行者不会在旅途中遭受饭后苦恼。同时，其健康的成分和简单、干净的口味，甚至对最挑剔的精灵的味觉也是完美的。
'What's this junk?' he asked.
'Quith-pa,' said Gilthanas. 'Iron rations, in your language. It will last us for many weeks, if need be.'
'It looks like dried fruit!' Caramon said in disgust.
'That's what it is,' Tanis replied, grinning.

recipeFluff.name: Ray of Frost
entries: This flavorful and strikingly cerulean concoction is said to chill its imbiber from the inside out. Named after the arcane incantation known for blasting its target with a rush of frigid energy and slowing their steps, ray of frost provides a cool option at upmarket taverns with more extensive and adventurous drink lists. Often served in a small crystal glass, Ray of Frost is an inspired blend of gin, absinthe, vermouth, and enough ice to chill even the coldest parts of Wildspace. The real challenge with this drink isn't surviving the initial icy brain-blast but surviving several glasses of it.

recipeFluff.name: Reghed Venison Pot Roast
entries: 法鲁恩北方冰冷无情的苔原，只有少数勇敢的人经受过考验，几乎没有人能够驯服。然而，雷格德野蛮人，一个由坚韧和迷信图腾的游牧部落组成的集合体，在这片土地上游荡得相当轻松，利用其稀少的潜力为他们相对较小的部族带来好处。为了忍受冰风谷的严寒，瑞格德人和其他类似的群体，比如北法鲁恩的乌斯加特人，必须最大限度地利用时间和精力来繁衍。在冬日营地（为度过特别漫长的冬季而按季节建造）的集体用餐与他们深厚的宗教传统一样，是他们尊严的战士文化的核心。鹿肉（羚羊、鹿或麋鹿的肉）是最容易获得的，因此也是最令人垂涎的，为这些足智多谋的游牧民族找到了各种用途，但在其他领域，牛肉或rothé也完全可以接受。一道标志着漫长冬季开始的仪式性菜肴（雷吉德人对此引以为豪）是烤锅。鲜嫩的兽肉、大块的杏干、切成两半的金土豆和季节性的草药枝与天然的野生肉汁交织在一起，使这道菜成为特别芳香和实用的单道菜。

The reindeer had begun their autumn migration southwest to the sea, yet no human track followed the herd...In normal barbarian life, the survival of the tribes depended on their following the reindeer herd...

recipeFluff.name: Rollrum
entries: The picturesque city-state of Tashalar is known for its jeweled coasts, temperate climes, and abundant vineyards, as well as for one of its most famed exports—rollrum. This dusky, licorice-infused tonic is noted for bright, herbal tones and a minty finish. Establishments of the highest pedigree, ranging from the Elfsong Tavern in Baldur's Gate to the Lady Luck in Daggerford (as well as a slew of questionable taprooms), offer up homebrewed incarnations of this absinthe-style classic. For those not inclined to partake in alcoholic imbibement, but who are still seeking a minty beverage, try elven {@recipe sprucebark quaff|HFFotM}, which also serves as a potent palate cleanser.

recipeFluff.name: Rothé Steak
entries: One silver piece is an extraordinary bargain for the Rothé Steak at the Yawning Portal—even if it is one of the more expensive things on the menu. Served sizzling-hot right out of the skillet, with just a hint of garlic and garden spices, rothé steak is a carnivore's delight and the perfect protein for a triumphant or aspiring adventurer. Along the Sword Coast, you can easily source fresh {@creature rothé|VGM} that is either farm-raised or wild game—there are devotees of both. Why bother with any vegetable sides? You won't get to them with this slab of meat to tackle.

recipeFluff.name: Ruby Cordial
entries: Ruby cordial is traditionally a saccharine swill of liquefied dark cherries blended into a fortified wine from the southern Moonshae Islands, where the aperitif first originated. While any cherries will do, the cherries of choice originate from the same rustic archipelago where they ripen in the sandy island soil, which imbues them with a sweet, robust flavor. Distilling cherry stems, skins, and even pits into the liqueur activates an almost nutty layer of flavor that hits right after the initial sugary wave passes. The Blade and Stars, a tried-and-true establishment in the port city of Baldur's Gate, offers a remarkable interpretation of this offshore staple using a traditional ruby port instead of fermented Moonshae cherry juices. Even better, the Blade serves food and drink right in the guest rooms, ensuring that no one will notice just how many of these wondrous cocktails are consumed.

recipeFluff.name: Saerloonian Glowfire
entries: It is said that {@i everything} in the Feywild is more beautiful—and more delicious. That is undoubtedly true when it comes to imbibing the already supernaturally delightful Saerloonian Glowfire. First concocted centuries ago in Saerloon, a Sembian metropolis known for its cultured and exotic tastes, Saerloonian Glowfire has become a notable export the Realms over. It has even made its way to Evermeet, an elven paradise transported to the Feywild long ago. While human in origin, this aromatic bracer, renowned equally for its alluring luminescence as for its refreshing hints of summer breezes and ripe pear, feels right at home filling the ornate wine flutes of high elven society.

recipeFluff.name: Salbread
entries: For those light-footed smallfolk who wander but still want to eat well, the kender of Kendermore look to salbread. This highly flavorful, square bread can last a full tenday in the pack before spoiling—or so it is said, as the actual expiration time frame has never been tested. These baked treats travel so well, they have found their way to many other corners of the multiverse and frequently show up in the packs of the halflings of Luiren, who are thought to be distant cousins of Krynn's kender. Usually made with lemon or orange peels and a touch of vanilla, these baked miracles not only taste delicious but also can prevent scurvy for those on ships or traveling in regions without access to fresh fruit.

recipeFluff.name: Seelie Court Cheese and Potato Soup
entries: For those adventurers fortunate enough to dine shoulder to shoulder with the nature-loving Archfey of the Seelie Court, cheese and potato soup is a hearty, not-to-be-skipped starter that warms from the inside out. This slow-simmered, savory concoction is a delightful mix of potatoes, onions, celery, chives, and ripe herb-infused cream cheese. It is so delightful in fact that it has escaped the mystical confines of the Feywild, making its way within the bustling walls of the Sword Coast port metropolis of Baldur's Gate, to the iconic Elfsong Tavern, where it has become a regional favorite capitalizing on the cornucopia of fresh ingredients on offer. Regardless of where you sample this surprisingly light and tasty soup, the spirit of the Seelie Court original is in every spoonful.

recipeFluff.name: Sembian Honey-Glazed Rothé Ribs
entries: 无论你选择的是牛肉、猪肉还是红烧排骨，这道令人愉快的食谱都不会出错。在大排骨上涂抹多层糖浆和蜂蜜（首选的蜂蜜品种是法鲁尼亚民族国家Sembia的蜂蜜），然后在明火上小心翼翼地烘烤。如果准备得当，这种慢炖的甜肉比手无缚鸡之力的哥布林的头更容易从骨头上掉下来!

recipeFluff.name: Sensate Palate Cleanser
entries: The appetite of the Society of Sensation knows no bounds: they are the ultimate explorers of experience, which takes them to the extremes of the palate. But the unfamiliar can only really be tasted against the baseline of the common. The Sensates lighted on the free cucumber soup that came with a cheap inn room at the Slumbering Lamb in Sigil as the perfect neutral reference points for embarking on a culinary adventure. Area taverns catering to this clientele turned this dish into a chilled leek-and-cucumber-based puree. Even for those without the restless curiosity of a Sensate, this smooth and mild soup is a refreshing appetizer no matter where it's consumed.

recipeFluff.name: Silverfruit Pie
entries: Let it be known, silverfruit, also known as lychee or soapberry, makes for a truly heavenly pie. This medium-size, pink-skinned berry is known for being especially crisp and juicy, with hints of citrus and a floral aroma. But as a pie filling it's surprisingly creamy and custard-like, and it pairs wonderfully with a toasted, flaky crust. The Golden Bariaur Inn (in Sigil's Lady's Ward), which caters to highfalutin clientele from the Upper Planes, serves an astoundingly good slice of this silky dessert. Since Sigil has no natural resources, silverfruit is one of the many uniquely curated imports from the vast array of worlds to which the greater metropolis provides access.

recipeFluff.name: Smoked Sausages and Kraut with Dwarven Mustard
entries: 在火热的锻造厂和充满熔岩的矿井中工作了一整天之后，大多数矮人对咸味和酸味的食物有着难以满足的渴望，而且总是与烈性啤酒搭配。没有什么比一盘堆积如山的矮人烟熏香肠和成堆的盐渍酸菜更让人心动的了--根据传说，这道菜是由矮人之神莫拉丁亲自锻造和传授的。在可能的情况下，将这些丰满的香肠与矮人芥末一起食用，这是一种轻度香料、甜味、石磨调味品。在科米尔的一些地区，这种芥末被广泛认为是一种万能药。

recipeFluff.name: Sornstag
entries: Popular at holiday gatherings of humans and elves alike, sornstag is a simmered venison dish that can be seasoned and prepared in a variety of ways. Traditional elven sornstag is slow smoldered with ground coriander, cumin, and hotspice or curry in a thick broth and is a popular plate among wood elves during the Highharvestide Festival. Humans have also adopted their own stewed preparation techniques for this gamey, yet succulent, main course. Throughout the wooded regions of Faerûn, stags are hunted by humans for both sport and meal, resulting in the proliferation of venison-based cuisine. In the bucolic forests and fields of the Dalelands, the most popular regional recipe for sornstag demands a full day's preparation. The traditional recipe calls for powdered almonds simmered with red wine to form the emulsified base of a piquant sauce, in which the meat soaks overnight before it is slow-cooked on an open flame from dawn for an early evening feast. But to get it to the table faster, you can skip the overnight marinade and cook it in an oven for just a few hours. Notably, the Silver Taproom, in Essembra, sees travelers from far and wide eager to sample its famous pied sornstag, which consists of a heaping ladle of this venison stew baked inside a buttery crust. You'll know the sornstag pies are ready when the scent of the aromatic pastry wafts down bustling Rauthauvyr's Road.

recipeFluff.name: Sour Cream-Walnut Cake
entries: It's rare to see this halfling specialty on the table, usually because it's gone before you ever catch a glimpse of it. Perfect for morningfeast, or teatime, the much-celebrated sour cream-walnut cake includes a delicious crumble of cinnamon, brown sugar, and walnuts, but it's the cake itself that takes the cake. A recipe passed down orally by generations of halflings, it is said to be made with the finest Luiren grain flour, fresh sour cream, and finely ground kaeth or coffee. The only known issue with the pastry is that there never seems to be enough of it.

recipeFluff.name: Spiced Pork and Orange Peppers
entries: It is said, "When in space, do as spacefarers do," and this can prove useful advice when talking about food. One will never know how, or why, pork became such a readily available source of protein on the Rock of Bral, but that mystery is beside the point when a steaming bowl of spiced pork and orange peppers is on offer. In truth, the underside of the one-mile-long ovaloid asteroid, founded by humanoid Captain Bral, serves as a sustainable and farmable ecosystem capable of oxygen production. It even contains a freshwater lake (Lake Bral), frequently refilled by water harvested from ice asteroids, and, yes, livestock in the form of swine. Spiced Pork and Orange Peppers was a favorite of the famed Captain Bral and has remained a signature dish on the menu of the Laughing Beholder, run by gregarious beholder Large Luigi, and other notably unsavory eateries that dot the avenues of this lawless asteroid outpost. When ordered "the Captain's way," the explosion of spices (paprika, coriander, cayenne, garlic, fennel, cumin, and some mystery space seed grown onsite) combined with the zest of the orange peppers is like a peg-legged dohwar kick straight to the taste buds.

recipeFluff.name: Sprucebark Quaff
entries: A refreshing nonalcoholic aperitif, the drink known as Sprucebark Quaff is famous throughout the multiverse for not only preparing the palate for flavor but also freshening the breath after meals. A simple concoction of clean, fresh water; mint; and sweet cucumber, it is served at upscale taverns, inns, and temples across the Prime Material Plane but is especially popular in the Feywild and upper planes, where a similar mixture forms naturally in many ponds, lakes, and streams. It's believed to have been invented by Faerûnian elves as a method of purifying water, using plants to remove toxins. Whatever its origin, it is sure to recharge trail-weary adventurers no matter what planet or plane they roam.

recipeFluff.name: Steak of the Deep
entries: According to legend, this hearty seafood steak was first prepared by homesick triton folk living among surface dwellers and eager for a nostalgic taste of their undersea home. Guardians of the deep, commonly clustered around ocean trenches and far from the eyes and reach of humankind, triton have increasingly emerged from self-imposed isolation to cohabit with the other peoples of the multiverse. A satisfying synthesis of tastes that borrows more from the surface world than from the seafloor, steak of the deep features a thick slab of braised swordfish, topped with a simmered tomato-based blend of onion, garlic, paprika, and a crisp dry sherry, yielding a fragrant and filling main course. While you won't find this in many triton settlements proper, it is a mainstay meal for well-traveled triton and is increasingly available at larger coastal taverns and, occasionally, the more far-flung spaceports of Realmspace.

recipeFluff.name: Stuffed Egg-Battered Toast
entries: 对于痴迷于舒适的半身人来说，没有什么比香草、枫树和核桃的温暖气息交织在一起充斥着他们的家更令人欣慰的了。厚厚的新鲜切面，松软的面包，在被鸡蛋炸过和煎过之前，塞满了奶油奶酪或马斯卡彭奶酪。最后是滴上自制的橘子酱或杏子糖浆。这种流行的第二道早餐通常在茶后供应，可以满足半身人的渴望，直到中午的第一餐。

recipeFluff.name: Stuffed Trout
entries: Those who happen upon the Solamnian city of Palanthus would be fools not to drop by the A Taste of Silvanost restaurant and try its famous Stuffed Trout. Of course, what the trout is stuffed with is anyone's guess. According to the menu (which is written in Silvanesti), you'll find "specially prepared mixtures" inside. But rumor has it the stuffing is composed of breadcrumbs made from the fresh-baked loaves of the elven proprietor Solamna Farseer, and seasoned with a rare spice known as Old Bay, named for the Bay of Branchala, next to which the city rests.

recipeFluff.name: Surrogate Steaks
entries: 多元宇宙是一个比许多人敢于想象的更奇怪的地方。在Oerth壁垒山峰附近的一个奇怪的废墟里，异世界的人类在他们的储藏室里储存了各种密封在透明密封袋里的食物。当一个前往那个被诅咒的地方的探险队的唯一幸存者回到灰鹰时，她声称是吃着她在那里发现的奇怪的肉回家的。当地的炼金术士们对她携带的剩余存货进行了反复推敲，他们确定那根本不是肉，而是一种奇怪的蔬菜化合物，经过调味后可以提供肉的精华。在这一发现的启发下，一些大胆的厨师开始尝试用自己的方法来制作这种 "代用牛排"，这一过程最终由高级精灵依靠大豆、大麦和可可脂完善。

recipeFluff.name: Sword Coast Seafood Bouillabaisse
entries: 你不需要经常去法鲁尼亚的港口，如永夜城、水底城或博德之门，就能享受到这道炖煮的海洋肉类混合物。在酒馆、家庭和无数王国的航海船上，这道永远流行的航海菜由鳕鱼或黑线鳕、蛤蜊和贻贝组成，在清淡的鱼和番茄汤中炖煮，并加入甘草味开胃酒和少量茴香。一些酒馆甚至在他们的菜肴中加入了令人印象深刻的阿尔达尼--如果他们能设法打败一个人的话。胭脂红--一种温和的红辣椒、大蒜和橄榄油混合物--有助于完成这道全年供应的芳香佳肴。味道鲜美的汤汁也是浸泡烤香草面包的完美选择。游侠和海上流氓都不会拒绝一勺子。

recipeFluff.name: Talyth
entries: The palm-size sandwich known as talyth is a beloved appetizer on many a menu, from Waterdeep and the rustic watering holes of Luskan to the cloistered refectories of Candlekeep and eateries as far east as the Sea of Fallen Stars where, it is said, the dish originated. Although countless variations exist, talyth commonly comprises meats (typically sliced sausage), cheese, spices, and herbs nestled between two large crackers, all lightly baked to adhere the layers. While the baking process seals in flavor, it also ensures its portability, making talyth a common travel snack along the major Faerûnian trade routes. Although frozen talyth can easily be reheated on an open campfire, freshly made talyth affords a more eclectic and adventurous array of savory ingredients, including diced egg, oysters, snails, and even spiced worms.

recipeFluff.name: Tamarind Balls
entries: For those seeking sugary baubles to brighten the palate, do not neglect the sour yet sweet tamarind balls that festoon the market stalls of Trademeet and the areas surrounding Firedrake Bay in the lands of Faerûn. From Amn to Calimshan to Tashalar, these tasty morsels made of tamarind pulp and dates are a much beloved dessert and trail-side snack. Some of the finest examples exist a few miles to the south of Trademeet in Mosstone, at the venerable Drover's Last Drink, where they add a bit of vanilla and large-crystal sugar to the mix. These treats travel well, and spelljammer captains docking at Baldur's Gate have brought them to the Rock of Bral and beyond, where they are much sought after by astral elves, giff, and even space clowns.

recipeFluff.name: Tarsis-Style Shrimp
entries: A famous dish from the Inn of the Last Home, perhaps the most storied tavern in all of Krynn, Tarsis-Style Shrimp is a rich and creamy, belly-filling shellfish concoction. In this delectable maritime offering, poached shrimp are combined with a fresh yogurt-dill sauce, which can be delightful when dolloped atop long, homemade noodles. In a popular iteration of this dish, detailed in the culinary notes of Tika Waylan, former barmaid at the inn, "pulled turkey breast is substituted for the shrimp and enlivened with a dash of dry white wine." The sauce itself is so flavorful, it can perk up even the most mundane meats, something resourceful locals were forced to do post-Cataclysm, which left the Tarsis seaport landlocked. Regardless of your protein of choice, this is a not-to-be-missed regional delicacy.

recipeFluff.name: Tavern "Steak"
entries: 这些多汁的肉饼是由混合肉类（猪肉和牛肉或牛肉和羊肉是流行的组合）揉成的，充满了丰富的调味料，准备得很快，而且味道很好。酒馆的 "牛排"，正如许多人所说的那样，是在明火上烤制的，以帮助密封咸味。酒馆牛排通常不配面包，而是配上各种温和的酱料，包括新鲜的奶油酸奶酱、碎番茄或黑橄榄和无花果酱，对于匆忙的酒馆客人来说，酒馆牛排是一种快速的晚餐选择。

recipeFluff.name: Tavern Crickets
entries: There is an old phrase popular among the dwellers of the Shadowfell: "Choice is for the spoilt." Perhaps that idiom is the origin of this modest and practical insect-based recipe that dates back centuries and speaks to the ingenuity of the plane's original inhabitants. Adult crickets are flash-fried, air-dried, and then seasoned with an assortment of aromatics, including chile, lime, and cayenne, and are served by the dozen in a large rolled-leaf "cone." As popular in the Material Plane of Faerûn as they are in the Shadowfell, tavern crickets are a crunchy, irresistibly tangy, protein-packed snack that can brighten the otherwise dismal days spent in the region.

recipeFluff.name: Tavern Noodles
entries: While the flavorful plate simply known as tavern noodles is a common dish throughout the multiverse, the version on offer in the various watering holes across the Rock of Bral is truly otherworldly. The noodles themselves are rumored to be the mouth tentacles of the catfish found in the deepest depths of Lake Bral. The truth of this is impossible to ascertain. What's less obscure is how delicious this dish is, especially when drenched in a light sauce made with rosemary, garlic, onion, and white wine, as they do at the Man-o-War restaurant in the Rock of Bral's High City. Whether by magic or mischief, these noodles are sure to satisfy even the most space-weary explorers.

recipeFluff.name: Tears of Selûne
entries: The bustling pedestrian pathways that etch the Rock of Bral are known for their prodigious offerings of finger foods. One such treat that garners all the accolades from the "locals" is a dish called the Tears of Selûne, a spicy, spit-roasted crispy fish, which came into fashion as a quick, crunchy snack that you can eat off a stick. Typically made with a firm white fish, like sea bass, the secret weapon of these delicacies is said to be the seasoning—a tantalizing mix of paprika, soy sauce, and sesame seeds. Today, you can sample these crispy treats throughout the Rock of Bral. Some street chefs fry them in a skillet, though connoisseurs insist the open flame yields the best texture. Whichever way you cook them, these fish skewers are best served with a starchy base, such as warm rice, to help all the delectable textures and savory flavors go down just right.
